Desc.entry: Offers advice in the following areas: benefits, employment, housing, consumer, tax, debt, child support, relationship breakdown, etc. Home visits on request. Helps with reviews and tribunal appeals for disability related benefits. Provides full support to the deaf community, including information on environmental aids and improving access for deaf people. Company limited by guarantee no 02966389. Self or any referral.

Langs.entry: British Sign Language, Sign Supported English, Signed English, Lipspeakers

ContactName.entry: Kate Bushen, Advice Service Manager/Maxine Wordsworth
